text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea falciferoides, also known as yakal yamban in the Philippines, is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Borneo and the Philippines. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea falciferoides". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33413A9781621. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33413A9781621.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
